conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Hi, thank you for calling Contessa Pharmacy.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Who am I speaking with today?

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Good afternoon, my name is Mary, I'm calling for a refill for my prescribed medications.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: I have been trying to get a hold of someone for weeks and was told that I would get a call back regarding my situation but it's been weeks and no one's contacted me so I thought I'd call.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: I understand your frustration, Mary.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Can you tell me what exactly you're trying to accomplish?

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Yes, I'm trying to get a refill of my prescription drug so the my doctor prescribed to me for cholesterol.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: OK.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Certainly happy to check that for you.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: One moment please.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: I see here that you were on a generic form of Lipitor, is that right?

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Yes, I was taking the generic form of Lipitor.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: OK, so I see that your doctor stopped prescribing these drugs in 2021 actually.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Oh really?

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: That doesn't sound right.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: I don't remember him cancelling my prescription.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: OK, yeah, I'd be happy to check that for you because sometimes there's a gap in the system and it just doesn't get reported.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: So let me take a look here just a moment.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: So I'm seeing here that your doctor had these drugs prescribed to you from 2012 through 2021.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Oh, I mean, I'm definitely supposed to be taking something else.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Would you check please?

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: OK.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Yeah.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: According to the latest records provided by the doctor's office, you're now on a different drug, metformin.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Would you like us to go ahead and fill that prescription for you for pick up Metformin 500 milligrams?

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Yeah, yeah.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Thank you so much.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: I'm almost out, so that'd be perfect.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: You're very welcome, Mary.

conversation.speaker: speaker_1
conversation.text: Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you today.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: OK.

conversation.speaker: speaker_2
conversation.text: Thank you.
